code: @Override public void afterPropertiesSet() throws Exception {     startServer(). }

void startServer() throws Exception {     if (this.server != null) {         try {             if (!this.server.isStarted()) {                 this.server.start().             }             logger.info("LiveReload server is running on port " + this.server.getPort()).         } catch (Exception ex) {             logger.warn("Unable to start LiveReload server").             logger.debug("Live reload start error", ex).             this.server = null.         }     } }

comment: /**  * Trigger LiveReload if the server is up and running.  */
code: /**  * Trigger LiveReload if the server is up and running.  */ public void triggerReload() {     if (this.server != null) {         this.server.triggerReload().     } }
